topic.title: Update IBMIDDOC markup table for DTD changes in IDWB 3.7

body.p: This enhancement garantuees support of new tagging added to IBMIDDOC.dtd

's IBMIDDOC markup table has been enhanced to support new tags and attributes in IBMIDDOC.dtd. The relevant IBMIDDOC.dtd is the one added to the requirement database on 23/09/2002 together with the sample files SampleFile_37.idd and SampleFlyer_37.idd. The embedded screenshots show the segmented test files in TM using the new IBMIDDOC markup table.
